entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 21 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
